developer: Talabat General Trading and Contracting Company
description:
Hey! Looking for the quickest food delivery? That’s easy with our new talabat app.

Whether you want a pizza, burger or groceries, choose from thousands of markets and restaurants in your city and put your hunger to an end. We’ve got it all – fast delivery, unlimited options, easy online payment and vouchers all at your fingertips.

Order your favorite food and get it delivered to wherever you are, but also get your groceries delivered to you with more cities to come. Your needs, done - simply download our app, choose your food or groceries and pay in a few taps via card or cash upon delivery. 

Browse a multitude of restaurant menus and order from countless stores. With our filters and smart search functions, you can find the exact menu or product you want in no time, available to personalize at your request.

"Pay online or in cash"
Add info to your account on our new talabat app to speed up your order process. Pay in cash or save card details to pay online, reorder your favorites anytime and save addresses so you’re ready for delivery wherever you are. Like planning ahead? Pick what time you want us to deliver to avoid hunger kicking in.

"Track your order from start to finish"
That’s right; follow your delivery from the moment it’s confirmed to the second we hand it to you. With notifications, you'll always be updated and our help center will answer any questions about your delivery – we’ve got you.

"Find exclusive deals"
Downloading the talabat app makes you a part of our fam. We’re more than food delivery; discover vouchers, promotions and deals and treat yourself to that midweek pizza or Friday night burger more often. By opting in for notifications, we'll also share new restaurants, supermarkets and stores in your area, so you’ll never miss out on the latest offers again.

Find us in Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Egypt.

Happy ordering.

Yoboresto est une plateforme de commande de nourritures en ligne. Faites vous livrer dans tout Libreville (Au bureau, en case, au taf, etc...). 
Nous sommes en partenariat avec plus de 30 restaurants à Libreville

Craving something delicious? Whether it's pizza, tacos, or your favourite fast food from Burger King and KFC, Bolt Food delivers straight to your door.

WHY CHOOSE BOLT FOOD?
- Real-time tracking: track your order and courier’s location from the restaurant to your doorstep.
- Convenient scheduling: plan ahead and order food or groceries in advance.
- Pickup options: prefer to grab your meal yourself? Use our pickup feature for easy collections.
- Takeaway deals and discounts: save on your favourite meals and snacks.
- Seamless payments: pay effortlessly using Google Pay, Apple Pay, or credit/debit cards.

HOW TO GET STARTED:
1. Set your delivery address.
2. Browse and pick meals, groceries, or snacks from your favourite local restaurants or stores.
3. Place your food order and pay securely.
4. Track your order in real-time.
5. Sit back and enjoy!

DISCOVER LOCAL AND GLOBAL FAVOURITES:
Explore a culinary world at your fingertips with Bolt Food. From beloved local restaurants to renowned fast food chains like McDonald's, get meals from your favourite restaurants delivered to your door.

*BOLT MARKET - QUICK GROCERY DELIVERY:
Need groceries or essentials delivered? Bolt Market brings everyday items like milk, bread, and coffee, as well as speciality products like pet supplies, cosmetics, or alcohol, right to your doorstep. Forget the long supermarket queues and shop smarter with Bolt Market.

*BOLT PLUS
With Bolt Plus, you can access exclusive benefits that save you time and money. For example, you can enjoy priority delivery for your orders, even during the busiest hours.

*GO OUT AND SAVE WITH DINEOUT
As convenient as it is to get food delivered to your door, some moments are worth making the trip out for. Find tables at nearby DineOut restaurants and get a discount off your meal. Just open the app, search for what you crave, and switch to the DineOut tab for in-restaurant offers. 

Bolt Food was created by the European super-app Bolt. It’s challenging the efficiency of the food and grocery delivery industry while helping restaurants and stores get more orders and enabling couriers to earn money.

Become a Bolt Food Courier partner:
Have a car, bike, or motorbike? Earn money delivering meals with Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/courier/.

Partner with Bolt Food:
Are you a restaurant or grocery store? Boost your sales by joining Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/partner/.

Get in touch with us via food@bolt.eu

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/boltfood.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
*Only available in selected markets.

Yelp has over 135 million reviews of businesses worldwide. Whether you’re looking for a new pizza place to try, a great coffee shop nearby, or need to book a haircut, Yelp is your local guide for finding the perfect place to eat, shop, drink, explore, and relax. The Yelp app is available for iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch.

Yelp features:

Food Near You - Find Restaurants
• Find the newest and hottest restaurants in your area
• Make reservations, order delivery or pickup—all from your phone
• Filter restaurant search results by price, location, open now, and more

Search for Nearby Businesses, Services, & Professionals
• Discover great local businesses, from hair salons to trusted doctors and movers
• Read millions of reviews by the Yelp community
• Home need repairs? Find the best rated contractors and handymen
• Find great deals offered by local businesses, get quotes instantly, and book appointments

Beauty - Pamper Yourself 
• Find highly-rated salons, spas, massage therapists, and more
• Book appointments through Yelp at the most relaxing staycation destinations

Search Filters 
• Filter your search results by neighborhood, distance, rating, price, and hours of operation
• Look up addresses and phone numbers, call a business, or make reservations directly from the app

Other Features
• Read expert user reviews and browse through beautiful photos of each business
• Write and read reviews, check-in to local businesses, upload photos and add tips for other Yelp users

Find local restaurants, read expert customer reviews, and start searching for businesses near you with Yelp. 

Need Help? Contact Yelp at https://www.yelp-support.com/?l=en_CA
Note: Continued use of GPS running can dramatically decrease battery life.

McDonald's Official App for Japan
The McDonald's official app offers not only daily coupons and latest information but also allows you to complete your order and payment seamlessly.



Features Available:
• Access to the Latest Coupons
Enjoy exclusive coupons that can be used in-store or through mobile orders. Show the coupon number to the staff by selecting "Use in Store" or choose a coupon from the mobile order menu category.
• Check McDonald’s Menu
Access detailed information about McDonald's products, including ingredients, allergy information, and nutritional content.
• Discover the Latest News
Find recommended news and products tailored to you right on the home screen.
• Order and pay via the App with Mobile Order
You can complete your order and payment entirely through the app. Skip the line and receive your food directly at your table (not available in certain restaurants or hours).
• Order from home and have your meal delivered by McDelivery® Service via the App.



How to Use Mobile Order:
Step 1: Log In
To use coupons or place an order, you need to register and log in. If you've forgotten your password, you can reset it via the "Forgot Password" option. Please ensure that you can receive emails from info@nsp.mdj.jp.
Step 2: Choose a Restaurant
Select the restaurant where you would like to receive your order. Please check the available restaurants in the app.
Step 3: Select Your Menu
Choose your favorite menu items. Coupons can also be used. Please note that some coupons available for mobile orders may differ from those available at the Front Counter.
Step 4: Choose Your Pickup Method
Select from table delivery (table service), counter pickup, takeout, park & go, or Drive-Thru. Pickup options may vary by restaurant and time. Table service, park & go, and drive-thru are not available at all locations.
Step 5: Choose Your Payment Method
You can pay with a credit card (VISA, Master, JCB, Diners, American Express), d-Barai, PayPay, Rakuten Pay, au PAY, LINE Pay, or Apple Pay .
Please Complete the Following Step After Arriving at the Restaurant
Step 6: Receive Your Order
Once you arrive at the restaurant, confirm your payment to start the preparation of your order. Enjoy your freshly prepared food.



How to Use McDelivery® Service:
Step 1: Log In
To place an order, you need to register and log in. If you've forgotten your password, you can reset it via the "Forgot Password" option. Please ensure that you can receive emails from info@nsp.mdj.jp.
Step 2: Select Delivery Address and Time
Choose whether you want to order now or reserve a delivery time. Reservations can be made from one day to two hours prior to the desired delivery time.
Step 3: Select Your Menu
Choose your favorite menu items.
Step 4: Choose Your Payment Method
You can pay with cash, credit card (VISA, Master, JCB, Diners, American Express), d-barai, PayPay, Rakuten Pay, au PAY, LINE Pay, or Apple Pay . Please note that cash payments are not available at some locations.
Step 5: Receive Your Order
Our delivery staff will bring your freshly prepared meal to your specified address. If you prefer a no-contact delivery, you can select the "Leave at the Door" option when ordering.
• Please note:
  • Delivery times vary by location.
  • Orders for the breakfast menu must be placed by 10:20 AM.
  • Minimum order value is ¥1,500 (¥1,000 for breakfast).
  • A delivery fee of ¥300 applies.

developer: Internet Services Polen Sp. z o.o.
description:
Discover the local choice for meals, groceries, and food delivery with foodpanda!

Life can get overwhelming, but we’re here to help! Whether you need daily meals, groceries, or shopping essentials, foodpanda has got you covered with convenient food delivery.

Order Your Favourite Food with Just 3 Simple Taps!

With foodpanda, you can easily choose the food you love, and we’ll deliver it right to your door. Serving millions across over 400 cities in 11 Asian markets — Singapore, Hong Kong, Thailand, Malaysia, Pakistan, Taiwan, the Philippines, Bangladesh, Laos, Cambodia, and Myanmar — foodpanda is your go-to for everyday food delivery.

Endless Food and Grocery Delivery Choices at Your Fingertips!
Hungry for wood-fired pizza, a classic burger or fried chicken? We know the best restaurants near you – big famous brands and tiny local faves. Best part? We've got exclusive discounts and promos waiting for all new foodies. With a simple click, your food and groceries are on their way with fast delivery!

Need Groceries? We’ve Got You Covered!
Want to cook but short on time? Imagine having fresh produce, pantry staples, frozen goods, personal care items, your cute pets' needs, and much more, delivered in a flash — everything you need for a hassle-free home-cooked meal, all available through our speedy groceries delivery service from foodpanda shops and pandamarts.

Best Food and Grocery Delivery Deals Just for You!
Looking for the best savings on groceries and food? We regularly update our daily deals, personalised just for you! Here’s a tip: skip the queue and choose self pick-up for extra savings on your grocery orders, or enjoy the convenience of our food delivery options.

Save on tasty takeaways.
On the go? Try pick-up! Skip the queue and save up when you self-collect your order.

Worry-free package delivery.
Need to send or receive a parcel? Go with pandago. Our reliable fleet and on-demand delivery service will safely deliver it for you in no time.

Our tech is shaped by you.
Explore personalised offers and delicious picks just for you. Dish out what you feel about your order and let foodies know what’s yum. 

Want More? Join pandapro!
Unlock even greater savings on food delivery and grocery options with our pandapro membership today!

Live like a panda and let us take care of the rest — let’s do it the panda way with seamless food delivery!

For more info, please visit our website.

Vuba Vuba is a pan African e-commerce platform that provides a convenient solution for residents in Kigali, and other parts of the country to order meals and daily essentials for delivery to their homes or offices within 1 hour.

Mob makes it easy to cook simple, delicious meals that fit your schedule - whether you're planning ahead or looking for a last-minute meal.

From speedy weeknight dinners to preppable breakfasts and packed lunches, we help you cook without the stress.

Key features:

Smart shopping list – Add everything in one tap, neatly organised by supermarket aisle.

Pre-built meal plans – Save time with curated weekly plans.

Search by ingredients – Got something to use up? We’ll show you what to cook.

Family-friendly recipes – Meals everyone will actually want to eat.

Cook with ease – Step-by-step recipes with your screen unlocked while you cook.

Delicious, reliable recipes – Tested by our team of in-house chefs.

Our Mission:

Mob is on a mission to make weekly cooking easy, fun, and delicious. We do this because cooking changes lives. It improves your health, lifts your mood, and saves you money.

Whether you're looking for a healthy dinner after work, a packed lunch for tomorrow, or a prep-friendly breakfast to start the day, Mob is here to help you cook incredible meals throughout the week.

Today, we're a community of over 500,000 home cooks. We make everyday cooking exciting and aspirational—not a chore. Not just a boring task that needs to be done, but something to look forward to, that results in a delicious meal.

We're building a movement of people who have cooking as an embedded part of their weekly routine. It's part of their life.

They are proud to say: "I'm a cook."

Try Mob Premium free for 7 days!

Get access to Mob’s full recipe library and premium features.

If you choose to purchase Mob Premium, your Apple account will be charged, once your trial has elapsed. Auto-renewal can be turned off at any time in your App Store settings after purchase. Cancelling will stop future charges, but you’ll keep premium features until the end of the current period. Deleting the app does not cancel your subscription.

Privacy Policy: https://www.mob.co.uk/privacy-policy

Terms of Service: https://www.mob.co.uk/terms-of-service

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/itunes/appstore/dev/stdeula

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

Устанавливайте новое официальное приложение BURGERKING в России!

BURGERKING – удобное приложение для заказа еды в ресторане, на доставку, а также на КингАвто.

С помощью приложения Вы можете сделать заказ и оплатить его всего в несколько касаний.
Чтобы получить заказ, Вам больше не нужно стоять в очереди: просто пройдите в зону выдачи и назовите номер заказа.

Возможности приложения BURGERKING:
• Заказывайте вкусную и сытную еду прямо из приложения, без очереди.
• Узнавайте первыми о новинках в меню и, конечно, же пробуйте их.
• Получайте короны за заказы и обменивайте на еду за 1 рубль.
• Не ждите долго свою еду - быстрая доставка в течение 30 минут.
• Платите банковскими картами прямо в приложении.
• Просматривайте историю всех своих заказов.
• Не переплачивайте - заказывайте еду по ценам меню ресторанов.
• Разожгите аппетит - посмотрите фотографии блюд и актуальное меню.
• Питайтесь разнообразно - Вы можете найти блюда на любой вкус.
• Экономьте - эксклюзивные и выгодные купоны со скидками и акции от ресторанов.
• Быстро находите ближайшие рестораны.

Обратная связь:
Ваши предложения по мобильному приложению, а также отзывы по качеству продукции и обслуживания в ресторанах БУРГЕР КИНГ необходимо оставлять в форме обратной связи в мобильном приложении или на сайте: https://burgerkingrus.ru/contacts

Вы можете подписаться на наши страницы в соцсетях:
VK (VK.com/BurgerKing)

О нас
Ежедневно в рестораны BURGER KING® во всем мире приходит более одиннадцати миллионов посетителей. И неудивительно: ведь наши рестораны известны вкусом фирменных блюд и отличным соотношением цены и качества. BURGER KING® занимает второе по величине место в мире среди сетей ресторанов быстрого питания, специализирующихся на гамбургерах!
BURGERKINGRUS.RU

The all new KFC App is the fastest way to order KFC food online. Ordering food and getting kfc food delivery has never been so easy, and within a few steps. Save your favourite order to avoid the hassle of looking and ordering the same items you like

In KFC, we believe in real cooks, freshly-prepared kentucky fried chicken and unrelenting quality control. Our aim is to take convenience to a whole new level and want you to have your favourite chicken options sitting at home.

Get started and order in minimum steps:
1. Download the app
2. Select the preferred language based on ease.
3. Check your favourite items categorized as part of menu
4. Add items in the cart
5. Login to use saved addresses or continue as Guest
6. Select location (Astana, Almaty etc.) and delivery address
7. Proceed to checkout and make payment
8. Track your order and get it delivered at a lightning fast delivery
9. Enjoy the food delivered at your doorstep.

Why you should use KFC App:
- Full KFC Menu: Order from the range of options - KFC Mighty Zinger Box, Twister Combo, Meals, KFC buckets & more! (Can I add items from current menu)

- Re-order KFC orders with ease: You can now re-order any of your previous orders in just a couple of clicks!

- Late night delivery: Late night hunger options. Look no further and simply order food online from KFC & we’ll rush to you with delicious chicken items even at 2 AM. This is available at select locations only.

- Hassle-free payments: With multiple payment options (including Credit Cards, Debit Cards etc.) on your fingertips, it’s now easier than ever to pay for your order.

- Special Offers: Get KFC Offers, KFC Coupons & more, customized only for you so that you can order more and get rewarded at times you order.

- Social Login: Why spent time in the login process when it can be done via social mode. Use your Google or Facebook account to login with ease.

- Have any feedback or queries?
KFC’s customer care is happy to help! Call us at - 7797

description:
Yemeksepeti is with you, whatever you have in mind is at your door!

Since 2001, as Yemeksepeti, we are the first brand that comes to mind when it comes to online food ordering, with our business partners and more than 50 thousand restaurants in Turkey and the TRNC!

Are you hungry?
Choose the restaurant, add the meal to your basket, pay online or at the door as you wish. The rest is easy, your order is at your door quickly!


Need grocery shopping in minutes?

Yemeksepeti Market is at your service! Thousands of market products can be delivered at any time, within minutes!


Do you want your daily needs at your door without leaving your home?

HungerStation – The First and Biggest Delivery App in Saudi Arabia

Whatever you need, HungerStation delivers it to you before anyone else. From your favorite restaurants, groceries, and pharmacies, to gifts and flowers. Our coverage reaches over 102 cities and regions across the Kingdom, with more than 55,000 restaurants and stores ready to serve you anytime.

Why HungerStation?
Because we’re the largest in Saudi Arabia: more than 55,000 restaurants and stores at your fingertips.

Variety that matches your cravings: whether it’s Pizza, Shawarma, Sushi, Sandwiches, Fresh Salad, Fast Food, Ice Cream, Coffee, Bakery treats, Japanese dishes, or authentic Arabic meals, you’ll always find what you’re looking for. Plus, you can enjoy international cuisines, traditional favorites, healthy options, organic products, and more.

Not just restaurants!

HungerStation Market: groceries, fresh fruits and vegetables, and cleaning products.

Pharmacies: from medicine to daily personal care.

Flowers & Gifts: want to surprise someone? Order now and we’ll deliver their gift wherever they are.

Payment your way: cash, card, or Apple Pay.

Daily deals & discounts tailored for you.

HungerStation Plus: unlimited free delivery from over 35,000 restaurants, stores, and pharmacies.

How to order? Just 4 easy steps:
1- Download the HungerStation app and set your location.
2- Choose a restaurant or store you like.
3- Browse the menu and add your favorites to the cart.
4- Order and relax, your order is on the way.

What makes us stand out?
Track your order step by step until it arrives.
Smart filters and search help you find the best restaurants and deals.
Real customer reviews to guide your choice.
24/7 customer support.
Schedule your order and get it delivered at the time that suits you.

New to HungerStation?
Enjoy a full year of unlimited free delivery from over 35,000 restaurants and stores as soon as you sign up.

HungerStation is more than just an app! It’s your shortcut to saving time and effort. Order in a few taps and rest assured, everything will arrive quickly and with quality.

Download HungerStation now.


HungerStation Before Everyone.

Dodo Pizza is perfect for a quick bite, a cozy family dinner, or a fun get-together with friends. It’s more than just fast food — we create our own recipes, work with trusted suppliers, and maintain quality at every step. So your food is always delicious, and delivery — fast.
CHOOSE AND ENJOY
– Hot pizzas on crispy crust with our signature sauce
– Tasty snacks — from light to hearty
– Delicious desserts for those with a sweet tooth
– Milkshakes and refreshing drinks
– Aromatic coffee for an energy boost
– Hearty breakfasts to start the day right
– Value combos to save


BUILD YOUR OWN PIZZA
– Try two flavors in one pizza
– Add or remove toppings
– Choose crust thickness


JOIN OUR LOYALTY PROGRAM
– Earn dodocoins — our in-app currency — and spend them on products
– Get personalized offers and discounts, including birthday deals


ORDER YOUR WAY
– Fast delivery to your door
– Takeaway when you’re nearby
– Table ordering in-store

TRACK YOUR ORDER
– Watch your pizza being prepared via live camera in the kitchen
– Track your courier on the map in real time

HAVE FUN WHILE YOU WAIT
– Stack pizza boxes in a fun mini-game
– Create your own stickerboard for in-store display


TRAVEL WITH US
Dodo has over 1300 restaurants in 20+ countries — and just one app. No need to reinstall anything when you’re abroad. Menu, delivery, offers, and service — everything works as usual.
Download the app now and order food in just a few taps. We do our best to keep it tasty, fast, and reliable. 
Got questions or suggestions? Reach out at mobile@dodopizza.com

Food delivery service from grocery stores, cafes and restaurants

You can order both burgers and steaks, as well as products from grocery stores. Free delivery for your first order!

ALL NEARBY GROCERIES AND RESTAURANTS IN ONE APP
Get your groceries delivered from both popular stores and local markets. And for those who don't want to cook, you can find your favorite dishes from cafes and restaurants. In Yandex Eats, you can order a cooked pizza or ingredients for it.

ORDER FAST DELIVERY TO YOUR ADDRESS
Enter the delivery address — we will find the nearest store or restaurant to you and deliver the order as quickly as possible. On average food is delivered in 32 minutes after placing an order — even faster than you would get ready to go shopping.

TRACK YOUR ORDER 
In the app, you can find out the status of the order and the location of the courier.

USE FILTERS TO FIND EVERYTHING YOU NEED
With filters you can find a specific cuisine or dish with one click. “Burgers”, “Sushi”, “Pizza” — Yandex Eats has sets for every occasion.

DISCOUNTS AND SPECIAL OFFERS EVERY DAY 
In the app, you can place an order profitably: for example, get free delivery or a dish as a gift. In the section “Promotions” we collect the best offers from shops and restaurants every day.

Yandex Eats is an information service. Delivery zones, delivery times, and restaurant offers are limited. To learn more, go to eda.yandex. Fast delivery: the average order delivery time is 32 minutes according to data from January 18 to January 25, 2022.

TheFork is Europe’s leading restaurant booking platform, proudly bringing people together through unique and affordable culinary experiences since 2007. What are you waiting for? Activate your location and we’ll activate your taste buds! You set the tone, we set the table.

TheFork continues to be savoured across the biggest foodie hotspots in France, Spain, Italy, the UK, the Netherlands, Belgium, Switzerland, Portugal, Denmark, and Sweden. But wait, what exactly do we bring to the table? Here are 6 reasons to download TheFork app right now.

1. Things that tickle our taste buds: fast, free and easy online booking
We know that normal life means having a lot on your plate, so to make things a bit easier for you, we've simplified restaurant booking. With a few simple taps on our mobile app, you’ll be one step closer to having that ‘mmm’ moment of pure belly satisfaction, in the most seamless way possible.

2. Frugal on prices, never on flavours
Our amazing restaurant partners love their diners as much as we love ours and offer exclusive discounts on reservations throughout the year (automatically applied and subject to conditions at the time of booking). That way restaurants get to open their doors to all types of diners, making dining out accessible to everyone.

3. Community insights = better bites
Tuck into the wisdom of our gourmet community! With over 20 million trusted reviews from only customers who have actually tried the restaurant—your palette is in good hands!

4. We don’t skimp on choice
Reserved? Not us. That’s just a label for a table. So whether you’re looking for the perfect spot for bottomless brunching, taco crunching or al-fresco munching, our foodies are spoiled for choice with our diverse collection of over 60,000 restaurants and 40,000 photos, menus and community reviews that will satisfy just about any culinary mood and occasion. After all, variety is the spice of life! Browse, scroll and add to favourites, so you can find more of what you love. Now that’s food for thought.

5. We take loyalty VERY seriously
To reward our awesome foodie community, every booking with TheFork accumulates unique Yums points, which can be redeemed in the form of a tasty discount at one of our many partner restaurants down the line. Here’s how it works:

1 reservation = 100 Yums (Y)

Once you've accumulated enough you can enjoy amazing offers which converts to: 
1000 Yums = £20 loyalty discount!
2000 Yums = £50 loyalty discount!

Keep an eye out for Double Yums and other ways to earn more Yums as you book.

We love hearing from our TheFork foodie community! Reach out at contact@thefork.com.

>In the UK, follow us on:
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheFork.uk/
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thefork_uk/?hl=en

Transform your everyday ingredients and cook delicious meals with Cookpad! Designed for home cooks of all skill levels, Cookpad offers step by step easy-to-follow, flavorful recipes. Explore a vast collection of recipes, save your favorites, and use Cookpad as your personal recipe organizer with themed folders. Share your own creations and discover new dishes from a vibrant food-loving community. Download Cookpad today and start cooking!

MAIN FATURES:

Endless inspiration, thousands of recipes for your everyday meals: 
- From tasty & healthy breakfasts to quick lunches and mouth-watering dinners, explore thousands of home-cooked recipes. And don’t forget the desserts—baked, frozen, or made in an air fryer!
- Global flavors: Discover dishes from Spanish, Italian, Thai, Japanese, and other cuisines 
- Ingredient-based search: Cook great meals with what you already have in your fridge or pantry. Save money, reduce food waste, and make cooking more enjoyable.
- Catering to all diets: Use filters to find recipes for specific preferences like vegan, vegetarian, keto, gluten-free, and more
- Healthy and diverse cooking methods: From roasting and grilling to using an air fryer, Instant Pot, or slow cooker, find a variety of methods in one powerful app 

Keep all your recipes organized in one sole place:
- Build your personal collection of recipes and keep all your cooking adventures organized
- Create private folders by category (such as fish or meat recipes, desserts, etc.) and plan your weekly menus effortlessly

Share your cooking creations:
- Share your favorite recipes with friends, family, or the Cookpad community
- Or keep your creations private, just for you

Join a vibrant community:
- Connect with passionate home cooks, follow other food creators, and get help in the kitchen when you need it
- Upload photos (cooksnaps) of the dishes you’ve cooked and share your cooking experience with others.
- Cookpad is designed for everyone—from beginners to experienced cooks—and for any occasion, from daily meals to special gatherings. 

Cookpad app is ads-free
- Enjoy a seamless free from interruption cooking experience with Cookpad app!

Cookpad is free to download and use. For those looking to enhance their experience, we offer an optional subscription service with the following features:
- Get the most popular recipes at the top of search results with Premium Search.
- Save unlimited recipes from other home cooks, so you always have inspiration at hand.
- Use advanced search filters to match your cooking preferences.

Cookpad Premium is available in Arabic speaking countries, Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, France, Greece, Hungary, India (English only), Indonesia, Italy, Malaysia, Mexico, Romania, Poland, Spain, Taiwan, Thailand, Ukraine, United Kingdom, United States, Uruguay and Vietnam.

Terms & Conditions: 
- Your monthly payment will be charged to your Apple ID account 
- Your subscription is automatically renewed month by month, unless you cancel it with a minimum of 24 hours before the end of the current period 
- Your account will be renewed in the 24 hours before the end of the current period
- Unless stated otherwise at the point of subscription, the monthly renewal cost is the same as the initial cost. 
- Subscriptions are managed by you and auto-renewal of the Premium Service can be canceled by going to your Apple ID account settings after purchase. 
- Read the full Terms & Conditions here. https://cookpad.com/en/terms 
- Read the privacy policy here: https://cookpad.com/en/privacy Get in touch with us: help@cookpad.com

Ayda App lets you search, order and enjoy local food and products in your neighborhood from restaurants and stores you didn’t even know exist. Cruise through products, menus, images, reviews and ratings to get your order for delivery or carryout. The app is free. And there are no hidden fees.

Tap into exclusive deals and quickly access local food and stores with easy online ordering from nearby restaurants and merchants with their latest offers, promos and coupons.

Get notified every time a new merchant is listed.

Top 8 reasons to download Ayda

1. Easily Search: Get the best from your neighborhood delivered

2. Easily Order: Add items to your cart. Free to order. Save time and money

3. Easily Enjoy: Chill out. Get the food delivered right to your doorsteps. Eat. Drink. Enjoy

4. Pay with Cash, Cash On Delivery, Credit or Debit Card

5. Track your order in real-time from the app

6. Order in Advance for your next meal, groceries or pharmaceutical needs.

7. Search by type of stores, cuisines, Filter by estimated time of delivery or minimum order amount

8. Sort Stores by price, ratings, open or closed

Ayda App is currently available in select cities. More cities to be added.

Discover authentic street foods from around the world with Flavor Road. This comprehensive app helps you explore, track, and learn about traditional street foods through an interactive map, detailed encyclopedia, and personal food passport.
Navigate through a beautiful map interface to find street food locations across different countries and cities. Each food entry includes rich details like ingredients, flavors, cultural history, vendor stories, and dining etiquette. Filter foods by category, dietary preferences, or occasion to find exactly what you're looking for.
Build your culinary passport by marking foods as tried and adding favorites to your collection. Track your food journey with detailed statistics showing your exploration progress across different countries and food categories. Unlock achievements as you discover new foods and expand your culinary horizons.
Perfect for food enthusiasts, travelers, and anyone curious about global street food culture. Whether you're planning a trip or simply want to learn about different cuisines, Flavor Road brings the world's street food scene to your fingertips.
